title: Pickpocket Twitch skin not working?
body:
Picked up this very cool skin but it doesn't actually load in the game. I have it selected in champ select then the default is on when the game is loading.
Anyone else having this problem?

replies.body: I had this same issue with pantheon skin I purchased!

I haven't had problems with getting the skin to work, but I've noticed another bug:

Pickpocket Twitch doesn't have gun SFX like it was advertised. It makes the usual crossbow noises, which really threw me off. Anyone else having this issue?
